channel.title: How to make a webclient for Mezzyscape!
channel.description:
Difficulty: 2/10
Knowledge: 1+1=...
[b]Things you need:[/b] JARMaker [url=http://download.cnet.com/JAR-Maker/3000-2213_4-10588876.html?tag=contentMain;contentBody;1d]here[/url] Notepad++ [url=http://notepad-plus-plus.org/]here[/url] Mezzyscape client (duhh) [url=http://uppit.com/1l9zeu7kzk3x/RSPS_Client.rar]here[/url]
[b]Step 1 Editing the ip (OMG THATS SO HARD)[/b] [b]Edit the IP in the ClientSettings.java![/b] [img]http://koolekit.nl/images/webclienttut1.png[/img]
[b]Step 2 Compile![/b]
[b]Step 3.1 Open JARMaker and Jar the client.[/b] [img]http://koolekit.nl/images/webclienttut2.png[/img] [b]Step 3.2 Go to the JAR Signer tab and follow this.[/b] [img]http://koolekit.nl/images/webclienttut3.png[/img]
[b]Step 4 Making the template.[/b] [code]<html> <title> Your RSPS Name - Your RSPS Slogan </title> <body onbeforeunload="javascript:alert('Be sure your account is logged out before closing this page!');"> <applet name="MoparTut" width="100%" height="100%" archive="[THE SIGNED JAR].jar" code="client.class" mayscript> <param name="worldid" value="2" /> <param name="members" value="1" /> <param name="modewhat" value="2" /> <param name="modewhere" value="2" /> <param name="safemode" value="1" /> <param name="lang" value="0" /> <param name="affid" value="0" /> <param name="settings" value="ROEqp2kbj*NX9PSCbdgpOvokkMwrCkXjg3c6KXgaLZY" />
<param name="cookieprefix" value="" /> <param name="cookiehost" value=".google.com" /> <param name="plug" value="0" />
<param name="js" value="1" /> <param name="game" value="0" /> <param name="colourid" value="0" /> </applet>
</body> </html>[/code]
[b]Step 5 Upload This files:[/b]
Webclient.jar Webclient.html
[b]And done :D[/b]
Credits: Me : 95 % laurent 248 : 5 % for the HTML Code

item.title: How to make a webclient for Mezzyscape!

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

This is no different than a normal webclient tutorial, except this one doesn’t tell you how to download the cache.

item.title: How to make a webclient for Mezzyscape!
item.dc:creator: @rikkieneter rikkieneter
item.description:
@rikkieneter wrote:

Difficulty: 2/10

Knowledge: 1+1=…

Things you need:
JARMaker here
Notepad++ here
Mezzyscape client (duhh) here

Step 1
Editing the ip (OMG THATS SO HARD)
Edit the IP in the ClientSettings.java!

Step 2
Compile!

Step 3.1
Open JARMaker and Jar the client.

Step 3.2
Go to the JAR Signer tab and follow this.

Step 4
Making the template.

[code]

Your RSPS Name - Your RSPS Slogan [/code]

Step 5
Upload This files:

Webclient.jar
Webclient.html

And done

laurent 248 : 5 % for the HTML Code
